alert.note: Alert for Magoffin; Morgan (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 28 at 11:57AM EDT until July 28 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Portions of east central Kentucky and southeast Kentucky, including the following counties, in east central Kentucky, Powell. In southeast Kentucky, Lee, Magoffin, Morgan and Wolfe. * WHEN...Until 200 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. Some roads remain closed due to flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1155 AM EDT, Flooding persists due to heavy rain that fell during the late night and early morning hours. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Campton, Lewis, Fincastle, Lexie, Landsaw, Trent, Malaga, Hazel Green, Lower Gilmore, Gilmore, Baptist, Stillwater, Daysboro, Upper Gilmore, Toliver, Murphyfork, Gosneyville, Helechawa, Rexville and Lee City.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
